text: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِى ٱلْقَرْنَيْنِ ۖ قُلْ سَأَتْلُوا۟ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْهُ ذِكْرًا

translation.en.sahih: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about Dhul-Qarnayn. Say, "I will recite to you about him a report."
translation.id.indonesian: Mereka akan bertanya kepadamu (Muhammad) tentang Dzulkarnain. Katakanlah: "Aku akan bacakan kepadamu cerita tantangnya".
